properties.name: Email Notification Template
Content

properties.script:
import sys,json template = sys.argv[1] header = sys.argv[2] subheader = sys.argv[3] content = json.loads(sys.argv[4]) htmlOut = template.replace("{email_header}", header) htmlOut = htmlOut.replace("{email_subheader}", subheader) contentString = "" for item in content: if item["type"] == "paragraph": contentString = contentString + ' \ \
\

\ ' + item["text"] + ' \

\
\ \ \ \ \ ' + "\n" if item["type"] == "emphasized": contentString = contentString + ' \ \
\

\ ' + item["text"] + ' \

\
\ \ \ \ \ ' + "\n" if item["type"] == "button": contentString = contentString + ' \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \
\ \ \ \ \ ' + item["text"] + ' \ \ \ \ \
\ \ \ \
\ \ \ \ \ ' + "\n" if item["type"] == "table": contentString = contentString + ' \ \ ' for row in item["items"]: contentString = contentString + '' for column in row: contentString = contentString + '' contentString = contentString + '' contentString = contentString + '
' + column + '
\ \ \ \ \ ' + "\n" htmlOut = htmlOut.replace("{content}", contentString)
